verses.1: Tu-in Paisan Pawi a kici Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi hun hong nai ta hi.
verses.2: Siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate in mihonpite kihta uh ahih manin kuama theih lohin Jesu a kithah theih nading lampi a zong uh hi.
verses.3: Tua ciangin sawm le nihte sung panin Iskariot tapa Judas sungah Satan hong lut hi.
verses.4: Tua ahih manin Judas va paikhia a, siampi liante le biakinn cing palik maangte tawh va kiho uh a, amauteʼ khut sungah Jesu a piak theih nading zia a kikum uh hi.
verses.5: Amaute na nuam mahmah uh a, sum tawh guaih dingin thuciam a na pia uh hi.
verses.6: Judas zong thukim a, mihonteʼ theih lohin amauteʼ khut sungah Jesu a piak theih nading lampi zon ding a kipan pah hi.
verses.7: Tua ciangin Silngo Sawh loh Anlum Pawi hun sungin Paisan Pawi an-a nek ding tuuno gawh ni hun hong tung hi.
verses.8: Jesu in Peter le Johan kiangah, “Va pai unla, eiteʼ Paisan Pawi annek ding va vaihawm un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
verses.9: “Koi lai ah va bawl le ung hong deih na hi hiam?” ci-in a dong uh hi.
verses.10: Amah in, “Jerusalem khua sung na lut uh ciangin tuibeel a pua pasal khat na mu ding uh hi. Ama lutna inn ah zui unla,
verses.11: a innteek pa kiangah, ‘Siapa in: Ka nungzuite tawh Paisan Pawi an ka nek theih nading uh inn dei koi lai hiam, ci hi,’ ci-in va dong un.
verses.12: Amah in a baih sa-in a na kikoih sa inn dei tungnung a zai khat hong lak ding hi. Tua lai ah a kisam khempeuh a baih sa-in na koih un,” a ci hi.
verses.13: Amau tegel zong pai uh a, Jesuʼ gen sa bang teekteekin va mu uh a, tua lai ah Paisan Pawi annek ding a bawl uh hi.
verses.14: A hun a tun ciangin Jesu zong sawltakte tawh sabuai ah a tu hi.
verses.15: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Sihna ka thuak ma-in note tawh hih Paisan Pawi an i nekkhop ding ka ut mahmah khat ahi hi.
verses.16: A mantakin kong genin ah, Pasianʼ Ukna sungah a cingtaak Paisan Pawi hun hong tun mateng, Paisan Pawi an ka ne ngei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin Jesu in a hai sang a, Pasianʼ tungah lungdamna a koh khit ciangin, “Hih hai hong sang unla, na vekpi-un na gual dawn un.
verses.18: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasianʼ Ukna hun hong tun mateng, tu a kipanin leenggahzu ka dawn nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.19: Tua ciangin anlum la-in Pasian tungah lungdamna a koh khit ciangin amaute tungah pia a, “Hih pen note adingin a hong kipia keima pumpi ahi hi. Keimah nong phawk nadingun na ne un,” a ci hi.
verses.20: Tua mah bangin an a nek khit uh ciangin amaute tungah hai pia a, “Hih leenggahzu pen note adingin a luang khia, Pasianʼ thuciamna thak a kipsak ka sisan ahi hi.
verses.21: Ahi zongin kei hong lehhek ding paʼ khut in sabuai ah kei tawh an a sawk khawmna thu thei un.
verses.22: Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasianʼ seh sa bangin Mihing Tapa si dinga, ahi zongin amah a lehhek pa in gimna thuak ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.23: Tua ciangin hih bangin a gamta ding eite lakah kua hi ding ihi hiam, ci-in amaute khatlekhat a kidong uh hi.
verses.24: Nungzuite lakah kua a lian penin kingaihsun ding, ci-in kiseelna thu hong piang hi.
verses.25: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Gentail mi hih leitung kumpite in a mite uh tungah ukna aana zang uh a, tua bangin mi a uk Gentail-te in amaute pen, ‘Miteʼ nopsak nadingin nasemte,’ a kicih ding deih lai uh hi.
verses.26: Ahi zongin note lakah tua bang hi lo ding hi; a lian pen pa a neu pen bangin om dinga, a makai pen pa a nungzui nunung pen bangin om ding hi.
verses.27: An ne dingin sabuai ah a tupa le an a pia pa kua lian zaw ahi hiam? An ne dingin a tupa lian zaw mah hi. Ahi zongin kei pen note lakah an pia-in na a sem pa bangin ka hong om hi.
verses.28: “Gimna ka thuak sung khempeuh note in kei nong ompih uh hi.
verses.29: Ka Pa in uk nading aana kei tungah hong piak mah bangin kei zong note tungah kong pia ding hi.
verses.30: Keima Ukna sungah an ne tui dawnin sabuai kiimah na tu ding uh a, Israel minam sawm le nihte tungah thu a khen dingin thukhenna tokhom tungah na tu ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.31: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Simon, Simon aw, lokho pa in buhhum a haih bangin note khempeuh hong ze-et nadingin Satan in thu a ngah khitna thu phawk in.
verses.32: Ahi zongin, Simon aw, na upna na khahsuah loh nadingin nang adingin thu kong ngetsak khin hi. Kei kiangah nong kiheikik ciangin nungzui na lawmte na hanthawn in,” a ci hi.
verses.33: Tua ciangin Peter in, “Topa aw, nang tawh thong a kia khawm ding le a si khawm dingin a kiging sa-in ka om hi,” ci-in a gen hi.
verses.34: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Peter aw, keʼn a mantakin kong genin ah, ‘Amah ka thei kei hi,’ ci-in thum vei nong nial khit matengin tu ni-in ak khuang lo ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.35: Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, “Note in sumbawm, ip le khedap keng loin kong sawlkhiat lai-in kitangsapna na nei uh hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin, “Bangmah ka kitangsapna uh om lo hi,” ci-in a dawng uh hi.
verses.36: Tua ciangin Jesu in, “Ahi zongin, tu-in ahihleh, sumbawm ahi a, ip ahi zongin a neite in keng unla, namsau a nei lo peuhmah in na puansilh uh zuak unla khat lei un.
verses.37: Bang hangin hih bangin hong gen ka hi hiam cih leh, Lai Siangtho in, ‘Mawhneite lakah amah kihelsak hi,’ ci-in keima thu a genna pen hong tung ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.38: Amaute in, “Topa aw, en in; hih lai ah namsau nih om hi,” ci-in a gen uh ciangin Jesu in, “Tua ahihleh pha zo hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.39: Tua ciangin Jesu a pai ngei zel bangin, khua sung nusia-in Oliv Mual tungah pai a, a nungzuite in zong a zui uh hi.
verses.40: Ama pai nopna mun a tun ciangin amaute kiangah, “Ze-etna na tuah khak loh nadingun thu ngen un,” ci-in a gen hi.
verses.41: Tua ciangin amaute kiang panin suanglot khat tan bang pai lai a, khukdinin thu ngen a,
verses.42: “Pa aw, nangma ngaihsutna bang ahih khak leh hih ka thuak ding gimna tawh hong kipelhsak in. Ahi zongin kei deihna bang hi loin nangma deihna bang hi tahen,” a ci hi.
verses.43: Tua ciangin vantung panin ama kiangah vantungmi khat hong pai a, Jesuʼ tha a hatsak hi.
verses.44: Lunggim mahmah ahih manin nakpi takin thu ngen semsem a, leilak a si mal gol taak bangin a khua-ul a taak hi.
verses.45: A thungetna panin dingin a nungzuite kiangah paikik a, amaute a dahna hangun gimin ihmu-in a om a mu hi.
verses.46: Jesu in, “Bang hangin ihmu na hi uh hiam? Tho unla ze-etna ah na puk khak loh nadingun thu ngen un,” a ci hi.
verses.47: Tua bangin thu a gen laitakin mihonpi khat hong pai a, sawm le nihte sung panin Judas a kici mipa hong makai-in Jesu a nam dingin hong naih hi.
verses.48: Ahi zongin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Judas aw, napna tawh Mihing Tapa lehhek na hi hiam?” a na ci hi.
verses.49: Jesuʼ kiim a om mite in a thupiang ding a muh ciangun, “Topa aw, ka namsau uh tawh ka sat ding uh hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.50: Amaute khat in siampi lianpen paʼ nasem pa sat a, a taklam bil a sat khia hi.
verses.51: Ahi zongin Jesu in, “Tua bangin gamta nawn kei un,” ci-in a mipaʼ bil lawnsakin a damsak hi.
verses.52: Tua ciangin Jesu in amah a man dingin a hong pai siampi liante, biakinn cing palik maangte le upate kiangah, “Namsau le molhtum tawh kei hih dingin nong kuan nadingun kei pen gal le sa ka hi hiam?
verses.53: Nisimin biakinn ah note tawh ka om khawm a, bangmah nong cih kei uh hi. Ahi zongin hih hun pen nomauʼ hun hi a, khuamial sung a uk Satanʼ vangliat hunsung ahi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.54: Tua ciangin Jesu manin paikhiatpih uh a, siampi lianpen paʼ inn a tunpih uh hi. Peter in zong a kihalin nungzuih hi.
verses.55: Inntual ah meiphual kicih a, tua meiphual kiim a tute lakah Peter zong a kihel hi.
verses.56: Mei awi-a omte lakah Peter a om lam, nasem numei khat in a muh ciangin limtakin Peter en a, “Hih pa zong Jesu tawh a kikhawlte khat hi,” a ci hi.
verses.57: Ahi zongin Peter in, “Ka nau aw, amah ka thei kei hi,” ci-in a nial hi.
verses.58: Tua khit a sawt loin midang khat in amah hong mu leuleu a, “Nang zong amaute tawh pawl khat na hi hi,” a ci hi. Ahi zongin Peter in, “Lawm aw, ka hi kei hi,” a ci hi.
verses.59: Tua khit nai lang bang ding ciangin midang khat in, “Hih mipa Galilee mi ahih manin amah zong Jesu tawh a kipawlte hi taktak hi,” hong ci teitei hi.
verses.60: Ahi zongin Peter in, “Lawm aw, na thugen ka thei kei hi,” ci-in a dawng hi. Tua bangin a pau laitakin thakhatin ak hong khuang hi.
verses.61: Jesu zong kihei-in Peter hong en a, “Tu ni-in ak a khuan ma-in thum vei nong nial ding hi,” ci-in Topaʼ kampauna thu Peter in hong phawk vat hi.
verses.62: Tua ciangin Peter pai khia-in nakpi takin a kap hi.
verses.63: Jesu a cingte in simmawh bawlin a sat uh hi.
verses.64: Puan tawh a mit tuamsak uh a, “Kuaʼn hong sat ahi hiam, thei dih in,” a ci uh hi.
verses.65: Amah simmawh bawlna kam tampi a pau uh hi.
verses.66: Khua a vak ciangin upate, siampi liante le Thukham hilh siate hong kikhawm uh a, uliante mai ah Jesu hong kipaipih hi.
verses.67: Amaute in, “Khris na hi hiam, hong gen in,” ci-in a dot uh ciangin Jesu in, “Kong gen hangin nong um kei ding uh a,
verses.68: thu kong dot hangin zong nong dawng kei ding uh hi.
verses.69: Ahi zongin tu a kipanin a Vanglian Pasianʼ tak lamah Mihing Tapa tu ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.70: Tua ciangin a vekpi-un, “Tua ahihleh Pasianʼ Tapa na hi hiam?” a cih uh ciangin, “Pasianʼ Tapa hi, nong ci uh hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.71: Tua ciangin amaute in, “Thudang bangmah kisam nawn lo hi. Ama kam mahmah panin i za khinta hi,” a ci uh hi.
